title: Wife Me
lyrics:
First base
I don't give it up until I'm first place
Boy, I know you want this in the worst way
No, now you better not waste my time
The only way you gon' get it is if you wife me babe, wife me babe

If you were mine, make every day your birthday

On time whenever that you want me

All yours, all yours

I'd give my all to you if I know you'd never hurt me

Pick you up whenever you are working

Got your boy dem jealous when I walk in

Fill you up, fill your cup

You know I'ma be the drink for you if you feeling thirsty



Save it for you if you are true

Don't be no fool

Ooh, ooh



First base

I don't give it up until I'm first place

Boy, I know you want this in the worst way

No, now you better not waste my time

The only way you gon' get it is if you wife me babe, wife me babe



If I was yours, I'd never leave you hungry

24/7, when you need me, I'll be there babe

On time, on time for a 1-2-3-4 you don't gotta [?]

Believe that I know you wanna pin me down

That is even if you ever get to work out how

If you need it, boy you better make me believe it



Save it for you if you are true

Don't be no fool

Ooh, ooh



First base

I don't give it up until I'm first place

Boy, I know you want this in the worst way

No, now you better not waste my time

The only way you gon' get it is if you wife me babe, wife me babe



First base

I don't give it up until I'm first place

Boy, I know you want this in the worst way

No, now you better not waste my time

The only way you gon' get it is if you wife me baby



You gotta wife me baby

Wife me babe, wife me baby
